rule.name: The display name needs to be changed. Follow the C4E display naming convention for DataWeave component. Example:"DW <define the purpose of this DW>". See https://confluence.corp.sprint.com:8452/display/MULE/Design+Display+Naming+Convention
Invalid DataWeave location. Change the path to classpath:dwScripts/<define the fileName in camelCase>
Some of the DataWeave did not externalized the set-payload script. classpath:/dwScripts location. See https://confluence.corp.sprint.com:8452/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=13729837
Some of the DataWeave don't have dw:input-payload mimeType defined properly. See https://confluence.corp.sprint.com:8452/display/MULE/Code+Review+Must+Listy
Some of the DataWeave did not externalized the set-variable script. classpath:dwScripts location. See https://confluence.corp.sprint.com:8452/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=13729837
